contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=March 2013}} [[Image:Reissdorf.jpg|80px|right|thumb|Reissdorf Kölsch bottle]] The private [[brewery]] '''Heinrich Reissdorf GmbH & Co. KG''' was founded in 1894 by Heinrich Reissdorf in [[Cologne]]. It produces a [[top-fermenting yeast|top-fermented]] [[beer]] called Reissdorf [[Kölsch (beer)|Kölsch]]. ==External links== *[http://www.reissdorf.de Brewery Reissdorf] {{de icon}} {{en icon}} [[Category:1894 establishments in Germany]] [[Category:Beer brewing companies in Germany]] [[Category:Beer brands of Germany]] [[Category:Companies based in Cologne]] [[Category:Companies established in 1894]] {{beer-stub}} {{Germany-company-stub}}
